english: I need to see a doctor.
Do you have any allergies?
I have a headache.
Where is the nearest pharmacy?
I need a prescription.
Can you recommend a good dentist?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن توصي بطبيب أسنان جيد؟

english: I feel dizzy.
What are the side effects?
How often should I take this medicine?
arabic: كم مرة يجب أن أتناول هذا الدواء؟

english: I need to make an appointment.
Do you have any pain?
Can I get a health check-up?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على فحص صحي؟

english: I need to go to the hospital.
I have a fever.
Are you taking any medication?
Do you have a family history of this condition?
arabic: هل لديك تاريخ عائلي لهذه الحالة؟

english: I need to see a specialist.
I am feeling better.
Do you have any dietary restrictions?
Can you help me with my diet plan?
arabic: هل يمكنك مساعدتي في خطة النظام الغذائي؟

english: I need to lose weight.
Can you recommend a good gym?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن توصي بصالة ألعاب رياضية جيدة؟

english: How often should I exercise?
arabic: كم مرة يجب أن أمارس الرياضة؟

english: What is the best exercise for losing weight?
arabic: ما هي أفضل تمارين لفقدان الوزن؟

english: I need a personal trainer.
Can I join the yoga class?
arabic: هل يمكنني الانضمام إلى فصل اليوغا؟

english: What is the membership fee?
Do you have group fitness classes?
I need to improve my stamina.
arabic: أحتاج إلى تحسين قدرتي على التحمل.

english: What is the best time to work out?
arabic: ما هو أفضل وقت لممارسة الرياضة؟

english: Can you show me how to use this equipment?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن تريني كيفية استخدام هذا الجهاز؟

english: I need to warm up before exercising.
arabic: أحتاج إلى الإحماء قبل ممارسة الرياضة.

english: Can I get a massage?
Do you have a spa here?
What are the benefits of this exercise?
I need to hydrate.
Can you recommend a good diet?
arabic: هل يمكنك أن توصي بنظام غذائي جيد؟

english: How can I reduce stress?
What are the symptoms of this illness?
I need to take a break.
Can I book a therapy session?
